title: Updates are Frustrating
author: Araplam
content:
The latest update is costing my business money!!!!!
As a subscriber of 2 locations per month this is not acceptable!
Whilst it may a good idea to add the Customer Name or phone number in prior to adding shipping address, this may be ok if the items are being delivered to the customer address, this is not ok in our situation as a florist.  99.9% of our customers have their order delivered to someone other than themselves.  I had called support and they have told me that I should use a dummy customer name. The problem is at the point when we enter the dummy customer name (which is each of our store‚Äôs name) we need to wait for at least 45 sec before the system picks up the name and then prepopulates with the details.  Then we have to delete the details prepopulated and add in the correct recipient and their address.

Our actual customers do not have time for us to ‚Äúwait‚Äù each time and therefore, we have been forced to go back to hand writing the order on a form (going back to what we used to do prior to POS) and then go through the process of adding the sale and delivery information after we have finished with our customer.  This is all double handling and we are having to spend more money on wages!

Your system is not very obliging for the amount of money we are already spending.  We are coming up to Mother‚Äôs Day where we have many orders to upload over a period of at least 2 weeks.  We cannot afford to have out staff handwriting the order and then spending more time entering the order into the system - we have gone backwards!!!
Would love someone to contact me to discuss and have this fixed before the end of the month!!  Maria - 07 47716767 (Malpara Florist)

title: Extortion
author: Bear1986
content:
I used to love shopify. Over time I‚Äôve realised I‚Äôve invested so much time in to this system that I‚Äôve made myself vulnerable to their ad-hoc changes and price hikes. You cannot trust that the features you have today will be there tomorrow. Or, if the features you need will be moved beyond a paywall that is more than 100% higher than your current costs. Basically, you can‚Äôt trust them to have your back. 

Don‚Äôt get this point of sale program if you‚Äôre a new business, small business, or start-up. Don‚Äôt get this system ESPECIALLY if you‚Äôre a single store brick-and-mortar. The basic features you need are not there (being able to save a cart or make an exchange). The basic features are behind the much more expensive tier of pricing.

title: New POS upgrade needs work URGENTLY
author: Sarah atkins
content:
I LOVED the previous Shopify pos app. 

It HAD all the features we need. 

Since upgrading, I do not believe we should have to pay US $85/month just to be able to have the same functions and features as we had before. That‚Äôs roughly AU$125-$130 PER MONTH.   

We‚Äôre now missing the ability to: 

1.     Initiate a lay-by (partially paid order) 
This is an enormous oversight and needs urgent attention. OR if the ability exists, some instruction on how to. 
URGENT ATTENTION REQUIRED. 

2.    Search for a partially paid order using the customer name, the process which makes the most sense. We now have to scroll through the list of orders (all orders) to see which ones are partially paid, it‚Äôs impossible. 
URGENT ATTENTION REQUIRED. 

3.    Staff pins? Trying to issue my staff a PIN number via admin as can‚Äôt work how to do it in POS app.  (they had one each before, 5 staff in total) and all I get is ‚ÄúPin is already taken‚Äù. Plus I can‚Äôt see my staff listed in Shopify admin. 
AGAIN, URGENT ATTENTION REQUIRED. 

4.    The ‚Äúadd custom sale‚Äù tile takes you to a screen where it‚Äôs very easy to add the amount, BUT the design and layout really leads you to press the ‚Äú+1‚Äù button rather than the ‚Äúadd to cart‚Äù button which seems quite hidden in the top right corner. 
URGENT ATTENTION REQUIRED. 

5.    Add to cart. Paying an extra $85 (US!) per month is an extreme extra cost for a feature that was previously included as standard. The technology has not changed for this feature. 
URGENT ATTENTION REQUIRED.  

6.   Remove extra steps. Please, to be exact,  a fourth option in the bottom row toolbar, that is a simple ‚Äúback to checkout‚Äù option. I should not have to press 5 buttons (at minimum) to get back to the cart page. It takes valuable time and is extremely frustrating. 
URGENT ATTENTION REQUIRED. 

Speed and accuracy are the most important things to consider in a busy retail environment.

This upgrade has so much potential, but considering the above is clunky and does not consider the merchant in a retail environment at all. 

If you‚Äôre going to upgrade and rebuild an app in complete usability and layout, then the existing services should still be available for the same subscription rate. We‚Äôre already paying for a system which now has LESS features, and your profit is going up, right? 

These matters need urgent attention, as we are heading into the Christmas period and cannot afford more time and money spent for a system that worked perfectly well before the update. 

It pains me to consider looking at other options than Shopify. I do not want to retrain my staff, or rebuild my store or POS system. 

Please fix these issues as a matter of extreme urgency. 
In the future when an upgrade is planned (BEFORE it is implemented) I strongly suggest deeper level merchant liaison and feedback, and restructure based on this feedback. 

Still a Shopify fan, just not a happy one at the moment. 
As previously mentioned, the above mentioned matters were already standard prior to the upgrade. 

Isn‚Äôt Shopify as a corporation making enough money from subscriptions and Addons and percentages of online sales, without adding on the massive new POS fees just for the same features we had?

Please work these UX issues out as a matter of urgency, or my money (your profit) walks.

title: Square malfunctioning
author: Hibunk
content:
The IRS allows individuals, especially sole proprietors, to use their SSN for tax reporting purposes. This simplifies the process for many people starting their own direct selling businesses.
Business Structure:
Many direct sellers operate as sole proprietors, which is the simplest form of business structure. This means they don't need to obtain an Employer Identification Number (EIN) unless they choose to, such as when they hire employees or want to create a more formal business entity. 

I want to use Square and have the option to utilize my Social Security Number, but it's not compliant with direct selling policies to allow me to do so.

Compliance with Direct Selling Guidelines:

Companies like Mary Kay Inc. are set up to comply with direct selling regulations. Representatives using their SSN adhere to these guidelines, ensuring they operate lawfully.

I took out a loan through Square, but my card was frozen and the loan never actually went through on my end. Despite this, Square‚Äôs system shows that I received the money ‚Äî which I did not.

I have contacted customer support three separate times. Each time, they acknowledged that there is an issue and told me they would contact their loan department and follow up with me by email. No one has followed up, and I‚Äôve received no resolution.

What‚Äôs most frustrating is that I‚Äôm still expected to pay back a loan for money I never received. This has caused unnecessary stress and wasted hours of my time trying to fix something that should be simple.

For a company handling people‚Äôs finances, this level of communication and accountability is unacceptable. Until this is resolved, I cannot recommend Square to anyone.

title: Rating: 1/5 (would be 0 if possible)
author: MaxCon Software
content:
Square has been one of the worst experiences I‚Äôve had with a payment processor. Their ‚Äúsecurity measures‚Äù on new accounts are excessive, poorly communicated, and operationally destructive. They placed my account under review and held deposits while still allowing payments‚Äîmeaning they let you take revenue and then prevent you from accessing it to run your business.

Customer service is the real problem:
	‚Ä¢	Lack of communication: No clear explanation, no definitive release date, and shifting timeframes.
	‚Ä¢	Constant lock/review cycle: Every time you comply, the ‚Äúclock restarts‚Äù because they claim they base the review on ‚Äúthe last submission.‚Äù That turns into an endless delay.
	‚Ä¢	Repetitive document requests: They ask for the same information repeatedly, even after it‚Äôs uploaded through their official system.
	‚Ä¢	No real escalation: Agents claim they can‚Äôt connect you to the team reviewing the account. The best you get is ‚Äúa manager will contact you in 1‚Äì2 business days,‚Äù which is useless when your funds are frozen and you have contracts to fulfill.

A payment processor‚Äôs job is to allow a legitimate business to operate reliably. Square did the opposite‚Äîheld funds, blocked transfers/deposits, and created chaos with inconsistent support. If you need stability, predictable deposits, and actual account management, look elsewhere.

title: GARBAGE
author: \o/ swim
content:
I had an extremely frustrating and damaging experience with Square. Without any real warning or clear explanation, they suddenly placed my account on hold and froze my funds for 180 days. This is money from legitimate work that I already completed, and Square is essentially holding it hostage.

What makes this worse is the complete lack of transparency and support. Every time I called, I got a different answer, no real timeline, and no one who could actually resolve the issue. I submitted all requested documents, verified my identity, and fully cooperated, yet my account remained locked with no meaningful explanation.

As a business owner, this is unacceptable. Square markets itself as being ‚Äúsmall-business friendly,‚Äù but putting accounts on hold for six months without clear justification can seriously hurt or even destroy a small business. Bills, payroll, and vendors don‚Äôt wait 180 days.

Customer service was dismissive, robotic, and unhelpful. There was no urgency, no accountability, and no empathy for the financial impact this caused. Once they have your money, you realize how little power you actually have as a customer.

I would strongly caution any business owner against relying on Square as their primary payment processor. If something goes wrong, you may find yourself locked out of your own funds with no real recourse.

Very disappointing experience. I will be moving my business elsewhere and do not recommend Square to anyone who depends on reliable cash flow.

title: Use Venmo or CashApp instead
author: KaM-
content:
Their technical platform is bereft of what passes for acceptable functionality.

I logged in to realize that a bank I have not associated with in 15 years was attached for my business, so I made steps to update the banking information to my correct account, while also disabling the ‚Äúautomatic transfers‚Äù that I had never turned on in the first place. 

What their system decided to do was send the entirety of the funds to the incorrect bank immediately; when I engaged their technical support for assistance, I was cited ‚Äúcompany policy‚Äù instead of seeing an ACH process interruption (which is a standardized banking process intended for scenarios where funds are going to an incorrect account/location), and repeatedly had to retype the information already provided in the Chat transcript (which their support representatives could not be bothered to review).

I‚Äôm now out my first business payment from a client, as the funds are going to my now-divorced spouse, and I would tell anyone who operates a business that accepts credit cards to simply use Venmo or CashApp for your payment collection options, because this same issue was resolved in moments without having to be quoted ‚Äúcompany policy‚Äù on why they would lazily not do the correct action.

I also was never given a process on removing old bank information, as there appeared no options to do so - again, both Venmo & CashApp make these actions easy to achieve.

title: Effective, just expensive‚Ä¶
author: Mr. White ‚Äî Macon, Ga
content: I‚Äôve been using Square for a couple of years now, & I must say that I am 90% satisfied with their services; however, they charge entirely TOO many fees. They always seem to find a way to charge you for YOUR money. I also use the square scheduling, which means they charge me an additional $29 for that every month, nearly 2% of each sale as well as an additional fee to receive ‚Äòinstant funds‚Äô, and an additional fee if you want instant transfers. Therefore, you never receive the total amount of money that you charge for your services unless you pass the fees on to your customers. It has worked in some cases, but not so much in others. If they could find a way to minimize the fees, the app would be phenomenal. The only other down side is that whatever transactions you collect Fri , Sat, & Sun will not be deposited until sometime Monday. It is a great intro into financial literacy as well.

title: I‚Äôm extremely frustrated with how Square handles new accounts
author: ACCOUNT DEACTIVATION
content:
I‚Äôm extremely frustrated with how Square handles new accounts

After I verify my identity with my government ID and complete the facial scan, Square tells me my account is approved to start taking payments. So I begin setting up my account I add my menu items, organize my products, and get everything ready to run my business.

But the moment I try to process my first payment, my funds get put on hold and then my entire account is deactivated. This has happened every single time I create a new account.

I‚Äôve tried multiple times, and the exact same thing keeps happening:
Square approves me after verification, lets me set up my account, then immediately shuts me down as soon as I try to take a payment.

I still haven‚Äôt been given a clear explanation as to why this keeps happening, and it has made it impossible for me to use Square even though I genuinely want to. I‚Äôm asking Square to actually review my situation, explain what‚Äôs causing these instant deactivations, and help resolve it instead of automatically closing my account every time I try to use it.

title: Warning: Square withholds customers‚Äô money without legal justification
author: Michele Coppola
content:
I have been subjected to abusive practices by Square. I received a legitimate payment for work performed, split into two transactions of $1,000 each. When I attempted to withdraw my funds, the company arbitrarily suspended my account without providing any clear justification or evidence of wrongdoing.

What is even more concerning is that Square has stated they will withhold my money for 90 to 180 days before returning it, which constitutes an unlawful retention of funds and an abuse of consumer rights. Such practices undermine financial trust and put customers in a vulnerable position.

I want to state clearly that there was no breach of obligations nor any suspicious activity. This was a fully legitimate, documented commercial payment. I strongly believe that Square should be subject to regulatory review for withholding customers‚Äô funds without a valid legal basis.

title: No Good for business
author: Rigo B
content:
I‚Äôve been using Square to take payments, but I‚Äôve run into a serious issue with how they handle customer disputes. Even when customers clearly lie about a service being performed, Square automatically sides with the customer. They don‚Äôt properly consider the business owner‚Äôs side of the story, even if the customer signed off on the work.

As a business owner, this is extremely frustrating. We put in the time, labor, and parts to get jobs done, only for Square to take money back from us without fair review. It feels like they prioritize the customer‚Äôs word over real documentation.

I hope Square improves their dispute resolution process and starts protecting honest small businesses as much as they protect customers. Until then, I can‚Äôt recommend them for service-based businesses where customer dishonesty can cost you big.

title: Holding Funds
author: All Hairr
content: I strongly advise business owners never to rely on Square for their business banking needs. Square has been holding my funds hostage for over two weeks. Each time I call, I am told the account review will only take 1‚Äì2 days, yet it has dragged on with no resolution. My account was flagged for review due to what Square calls ‚Äúfraudulent activity,‚Äù most likely because of the volume of transactions I process‚Äîwhich is normal for a legitimate business. In the meantime, I cannot access the money I rightfully earned. Square continues to give me the same scripted responses with no progress, leaving me unable to use my own funds. Business owners should be warned: Square can and will freeze your money for weeks at a time, jeopardizing your operations and financial stability. I am filing a formal complaint with the CFPB, and I am prepared to escalate further, including filing a police report, to recover my funds. Please do not make the mistake of trusting Square as your business banking solution.

I don't know why they went backwards with this change. also the whole app is running more slowly after the last update
developerResponse: Thank you for your feedback. We understand the recent update has added extra steps and affected performance. We're continuously working to improve the app experience and appreciate your patience. If you have further concerns, please reach out to our support team at help.shopify.com/support.

author: Matthew Onassis
content: Absolute Garbage app. It's literally POS! Sometimes it takes 1-2 minutes for the app to load on a 500 mbps internet. It keeps saying connection failed. 90% of the time products won't load on thr app. You gotta keep closing and opening it to load them and the app to accept payments. Can you imagine you're selling your products on the go, and your customers have to wait 5 minutes to load your POS for them? Do better, Shopify! Stop outsourcing everything to third world countries.
developerResponse: We understand the frustration with the app's performance. Please ensure your app is updated to the latest version. If issues persist, contact our support team at help.shopify.com/support for further assistance. We appreciate your patience as we work to improve your experience.

author: Tommer Kahan
content: I've used it on both Android and iOS, phones and tablets, for a few months now. Shopify clearly is focused on its ecommerce product (which is great), leaving the POS quite neglected. No at store pickup scheduling, no built-in tickets, very sluggish when connected to the payments terminal (yes, fully updated), no built-in modifiers (like pizza toppings or supersizing), generally bad UI (unnecessarily huge item button). Square was better. This is not a POS, it's make believe.
developerResponse: Thank you for your feedback. We understand the importance of a seamless POS experience and are continuously working to improve our features. Your insights on store pickup scheduling, built-in tickets, and modifiers are valuable. Feel free to reach out to our support for further assistance with the POS Terminal, and we're happy to help.

author: David Blatch
content: So slow, not worth using. By the time the app has warmed up and reconnected to our Wisepad, which it has to do on a regular basis throughout the day, our customers have either left or are getting edgy and wanting to leave. Bad for business, makes us look unprofessional. If our entire site wasn't based on Shopify, I would look for an alternative.
developerResponse: We understand the importance of a seamless experience and apologize for the inconvenience. Please ensure your app is updated to the latest version. If the issue persists, contact our support team at help.shopify.com/support for further assistance. We appreciate your feedback and are here to help.

author: Rosie Marshall-Wilks
content: urgh. seriously fix the android app. ive updated the app but yet still says "update required" nope it doesnt. ive also been having issues with the card reader staying connected, even though it says its connected.
developerResponse: We understand you're experiencing issues with the update prompt and card reader connectivity. Please try reinstalling the app and ensure your device's software is up-to-date. If the problem persists, contact our support team at help.shopify.com/support for further assistance.

author: Sonya Beeler
content: I do not like that I had to add a pin the phone to use this app.. find a way to secure the app without effecting my over all phone usage

author: Oviex
content: do not work any more keep telling me to update to the last version and I have the last version and still don't work no more.
developerResponse: It seems like you're experiencing issues with the app update. Please try reinstalling the app to see if that resolves the problem. If the issue persists, reach out to our support team at help.shopify.com/support for further assistance.

author: Christo Botha
content: Why remove the warning and user acknowledgement the item they are trying to sell on the POS has been sold on a different channel and there is no stock?

author: Rhiannon Kirby
content: why would you kick a newer android off the tap to phone but a 12 yr old apple works wth... and no help to fix it but a new customer can get a free reader?
developerResponse: We understand your frustration with the device compatibility issue. Our team is continuously working to improve device support. Please reach out to our support team at help.shopify.com/support for further assistance. We appreciate your patience and feedback.

author: Austin Lehmann
content: What a great app! It's a little slow BUT so convenient and its very well organized

author: Sassy Sparkles 5 Jewelry
content: I was happy with the app on my tablet. Now it shows that it updated the software. I am disappointed that the "save cart" feature was removed. Now it says " save as draft", but you need to have the paid version of Shopify Point Of Sale. This has disrupted my selling because I sometimes get payments at the end of the day, and it does not allow me to save and recall an order. Is there a way to revert to the previous version. I liked it better.

author: Daniel Barnett
content: Very poor. Images of products do not load. Occasionally they do but 90% of the time they just don't. This is on the free version so now way we're paying for the full version! Plus have to type in pin every time you want to use, even though on my already secured phone, which causes a long delay when you really just want to serve the customer. Utter trash of an app. Can put sales though once searched for each-individual-product-slowly. Sometimes receipts don't print either! Happy to revise review

author: Natalie Parker
content: I was using this at an event today, and when I go to checkout with a card, the app keeps telling me to wake up my reader. Then the app closes itself out, and I get a notification that it's crashed. I have to then try again, and MAYBE IT will work this time, which honestly takes a few more times of crashing to work. I eventually got frustrated and used my square app, which takes credit cards faster, and I don't need an extra device as I can use my phone as a tap.

author: Yana Dee Store Team
content: The recent update in mid May 2024 was for the worse. Clicking on a variant no longer adds it to the active cart. The whole purpose of this app is to add items to the cart to sell them. I don't want to look at every picture and stat of the item, I want to add it to the cart and sell it. If I wanted an in-depth analysis of the product, I would go to the Shopify app or better yet my computer. PLEASE CHANGE IT BACK!

author: A Google user
content: once set up, it's been s great app. they will ask for more information after a while, and held my money (about 10k) for a month while I submitted a copy of my id multiple times. this really impacted my ability to pay bills for my business. I even stayed on the line with them while I scanned and emailed it in. so, it works, but customer service is poor.

author: Bijan Soularie
content: Nice app with potential...and I'm saying this after using the app for several years. I wouldn't have to say that if it weren't for recent updates. Like the one with the customer choosing their receipt type. My register is not set up in a way that allows that, so now it just slows me down. Please make it so I can toggle that option on or off. I'm already tired to having to keep pressing extra buttons just to tender a sale. Also, sometimes a CASH transaction will say PAYMENT DECLINED.
developerResponse: Hello Bijan, thank you for your review. The receipt selection option can be disabled in your Shopify Admin under Point of Sale > Settings > Customer receipt selection. If you are still experiencing issues with this or with cash transactions declining, please contact us through our Help Center at help.shopify.com, and we would be happy to assist.

author: Ashley Ledgerwood
content: The new app is terrible! it is so slow! It kicks you out when your in the middle of serving someone. It takes forever to bring up the products you are searching for. And once you click on it it takes you back to the start, but I have variants of products so its such a pain that I have to look it up again to click a different one! Hate the new version, the old app was so much better!

author: Stefanie Walls
content: I had the "pleasure" of beta testing this app. I have been waiting 5 years for an android friendly POS from shopify. I consistently get told I'm not connected to the internet. Payment transactions freeze and I was given zero guidance on hardware capabilities. I would love to add the receipt printer and barcode scanner, but no one can tell me if they are compatible. The tiles are very confusing, too. Some are grayed out and won't let me use them. I hope the developers are taking all the feedback and making adjustments.

author: E H
content: If I had a choice, I would not be using this system as a POS. Very Very slow on everything I do scanning on products, searching for products and cashing people out. The lock screen keep freezing up on me and can't get into system. I went to buy a new tablet thinking it was my old tablet problem but that is not the case. it is the app itself. I have message support team and hopefully they can figure out the problem.

author: Holly Walker
content: I'll start by saying that I love Shopify. But, I want the old app back! This app is slow and hard to navigate. Also, I have card reader issues on every Shopify app on every devise. It will never stay connected and eventually the card reader dies completely, but Shopify support will not claim it is a hardware issue. It is very frustrating. I just want the old card reader that plugs in to the phone back.

author: Paul Lindsay
content: It just doesn't work properly! We've been battling with the app for a few months, support tried to help but the last time they asked for all sorts of detail and screen videos, we gave up. We've had problems with search and connecting to hardware mainly. Support asked us to make sure we were on Android 12, our fairly new ¬£175 tab isn't on it yet, and there are only a couple of high end tabs on Android 12 on the market so far as we can see. Today I bought a second hand ¬£160 iPad 6 and downloaded the app from the Apple store and everything works! It's amazing, really fast, hooks up to our card reader instantly and search finds results right away. It's a completely different experience. I'm guessing if you are reading this you are installing on Android. My advice is don't bother, buy the most recent iPad you can justify and save yourself a load of grief. When the Android version is as good as the Apple version it will be amazing. Hopefully that will be soon and I won't have wasted money on an Android tablet.

author: Jordan Hewlett
content: Simple but slow. does it job but the loading time just opening the app is frustrating when trying to make a sale.

author: frange
content: I don't usually write reviews but I will do an exception for this app. This app is junk, I have a chip and swipe reader. It was working fine before, and today I am at an event and the card reader is not working anymore. It shows that it's connected but when I go to the checkout only manual entry is available for the reader. I spent hours trying to troubleshoot at no avail. I even reinstalled the app. I am so frustrated now. I am going back to square app from now on. You guys need to do better.

author: Amanda
content: Not good for craft shows, markets, or pop-ups. There is no option to update the location for collecting sales tax. The suggestion I was given was to create a different location and transfer all of my products over into this new location then change the address for that temporary location every time I do a pop up which is 9 out of 12 months of the year. All over my state. This is clunky. Other POS systems that I've used in the past have a simple option to type in the the tax rate for the day.

author: Mikang Z
content: Reciently the POS till has been crashing almost everyday. Right as you check out, the chipreader either does not connect well and it just gets stuck on payment method page. You then have to restart the app and restore the transaction. Then it will get stuck on the payment processing page. So you restart the app again. Repeat again with all customers. This has been the case for the last week or two. Connectivity issues always. Chip and tap pairing fails too. üòû reallywishing for an older version.

author: Jessie
content: 7/26/21 update: Shopify continues to tell me it's a hardware problem and I've done more hours of troubleshooting. They sent me a new card reader that also doesn't work. Now they want to send me another card reader. Is anyone else having the same experience? 721/21 update: I'm continuing to jump through troubleshooting hoops with Shopify support. Now Shopify is claiming my card reader must be defective. That doesn't even address all the other issues I'm having. Shopify, please go back to the previous app version or allow users to decide which version they want to run. This new one is terrible. The update is awful. It's absolutely crippling my ability to use this as a POS. Very unhappy. Fyi, I am running the latest version of the app.

author: Bob Johnson
content: Bells, whistles, bugs, and connectivity problems. Chip reader and swipe will drio out, and not reconnect. Only fix is to forget reader, restart device, and start over. Hardly a good option when you are trying to process orders at a high traffic craft fair. Please bring back the old app. It was perfect for pop up shows and fairs. Keep this one for those that need the extras, and re-release the old one as "Shopify POS Lite".

author: Meiliana Sintaraga
content: I've been a Shopify client for a long time, and I've never encountered this type of problem with the older version...EVER! Hey tech support, can you please do something about the constant log out and the pin request? I saw that you posted something about the "settings->account->Shopify,etc. DOES. NOT. WORK!!!! EMAIL ME!!!! I have a shop to run & your POS is literally a POS!
developerResponse: Hi Meiliana! Thank you so much for your feedback. The app's Screen Lock period can be adjusted by navigating to the POS app > ‚ò∞ > Settings > Screen lock. While our Support team isn't able to send outbound emails, they can be reached via shopify.com/contact if you need any assistance with this and we'd be happy to help.

author: Allie Marini
content: Issue resolved. The tap to pay chip reader was not always reliable at events where the WiFi was not strong or being used by a lot of people. Once I changed to use my phone as the tap reader, it wasn't an issue anymore, and the chip reader was able to read the few cards that didn't have a tap chip. If you're working at an event, I suggest making your phone your primary and/or adding a mobile hotspot to boost your chip readers' functionality.
developerResponse: Hi Allie, thanks for sharing your feedback with us. If you're still having trouble, please contact our Retail Support team at help.shopify.com for troubleshooting assistance. We know how important it is for your POS to work reliably, especially at events, and are available 24/7 to assist anytime. - Caroline, Shopify Support

author: Donabate Dexter
content: Bought 2 card readers, neither connect. Both shopify hardware. In Ireland. *update...seller of pos card readers will accept a return of products. The fact that you cannot use this product with android needs to be very clear. Alot if hassle could have been avoided. The shopify app itself is good. Just don't get the card reader if you use android.

author: Hedonist
content: APP UI IS TOO SLOW AND BUGGED TO BEGIN WITH, THEN THEY MAKE YOU REGISTER BEFORE YOU CAN EVEN TRY THE APP ONLY TO BAIT YOU AFTERWARDS WITH A TRIAL PERIOD, GOOGLE SHOULD BAN SUCH APPS THAT DON'T EVEN STATE THEY HAVE IN-APP PURCHASES, I AM REPORTING THIS APP FOR SCAM! ü§Æ
developerResponse: We appreciate your feedback and understand your concerns about the app's performance and registration process. We're continuously working to improve the user experience. For any issues or feedback, please reach out to our support team at help.shopify.com/support. Thank you for your patience.

author: Warren manning
content: After the last update to the tap & chip card reader. My reader has been unable to process chip cards. It says processing payment and gets stuck on that screen. There is no longer a point in the transaction that tells us to remove the card. And it no longer gets to the point where it says completing transaction. A total refresh is needed to get back to use the app. This is not a hardware problem as all 4 of my tap & chip reader are doing the same. 2 are brand new. Pls fix this massive bug!!!

author: Carmela Frigand
content: it's great! but you shop with a third party to a third party and I got a bill and I didn't know what it was from and it was from a third party on Shopify and I found out it was from a firm that I owed them $14 it was a month behind. I didn't know it. I didn't know that I was on a third party when I ordered the merchandise. 0 so you're dealing with a third party consumer? And you don't know who's giving you the credit

author: Mark J
content: Slower interface than expected since transitioning from Square. When you click on one of your collections, sometimes it takes a second or more to load your items. Moreover, there is no way to disable receipt options from the customer facing POS Go. This is an efficiency killer for retail shops and needs to be fixed. I print receipts automatically, so there is no need for the customer to select anything post-sale. Also, why is everything so big? There should be a way to adjust to reduce scrolling

author: Kaytlon Everitt
content: May 2021 update is awful and buggy. I keep having to restart my entire device, issues with card reader pairing, active items in store will show up for one transaction then not pull up for the next transaction, customers transactions timing out when swiping, tapping, apple pay, and even manual entry. There is only one improvement- exchanges seems to be made easier. Everything else about it is a hot mess embarrassing to deal with when you have a line of customers.

author: Arun Das (ADTC Rulez)
content: Ridiculous that the app opens with a Big and Bold "Get Started" button that misleads users to create a new store when they are more likely to want to log in to an existing one. The Login link is in a hardly visible text below the button. Please change this so that it's the other way around, with a big prominent "Log in to your store" button, and then the link below to say "Don't have a store yet? Create one".. please think, most would want to login to a store they already have, not create new!

author: Bonny Durbin
content: I constantly have connecting issues with the hardware and while using it with customers, you cannot enter amounts with descriptions only, but must select each inventory item. It takes too long to do that and then have connecting issues on top of this. NOT Good! I get very angry customers for having to wait and then worry if their card has been charged for tapping so many times!

author: Michelle Burkel-Ammerman
content: Its quite embarrassing when you're at a show and your POS doesn't work. So yes POS is correct. You should have left it the way it was. I'm at my last with this NEW AND IMPROVED app!! None of my products come up. It takes forever to load. It doesn't read my chip reader... the list goes on and on!! Clear your cache they say. Restart your phone they say. Uninstall and reinstall they say. I'm about to change providers if y'all don't fix this!!

author: CHEF ANTHONY MIAMI
content: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Keith went above and beyond to help me with my Shopify account. He was patient, professional, and explained everything in a way that made the process easy to understand. I truly appreciate his support and highly recommend working with him if you need help!

author: A Google user
content: This app consistently is not in sync with our actual inventory. Hundreds of products that are in our inventory do not scan properly, wasting time when we have to manually remove a product after checkout. Their service team is inept at actually figuring out issues. They offer apologies and not solutions. This is a small business' worst nightmare.

author: Jakob Hendrikx
content: This is the worst pos I've ever touched. Every time I look at it something else is wrong. Products lose their names only in the pos, the items won't place into carts, putting in a pin to log in leaves you staring at the pin login screen unmoving. It's garbage. Edit: I'm returning after a year and a bit. It's still terrible. The same problems persist. The website itself is a horrible thing. Do not use this garbage

author: Ozair Qadir
content: Recently the POS app has not been functioning properly. I want to add products to order but the products don't show up on search.
developerResponse: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with the POS app. Please ensure your app is updated to the latest version. If the problem persists, contact our support team at help.shopify.com/support for further assistance. We're here to help!

author: Joseph & Lashanda Lewis
content: We were excited about the update and the use of our card readers to make shopping simple with our brand, however we've encountered the following difficulties. - Card reader does not connect or fails to stay connected. - delayed transactions (big issue) causing us to restart the app and restore checkout. Even cash transactions get delayed. - repeat customers information does not populate for faster checkout. - Apple pay doesn't work We hope these issues can be resolved

author: Gregory Spear
content: Completely scalable from kitchen table operation to mega international business. I picked it after an extensive search because of this scalability and the very low cost for entry. Thousands of apps in it's app store to help you customize it for your particular purpose and if those aren't enough, it's fully customizable by pros you can hire all over the world. It's hosted, so be sure to get a backup app.

author: Amy Vickers
content: This app just sits on the loading page during setup for an hour and then crashes. Tried Uninstalling and reinstalling several times over 2 days while trying to set it up. Using Android. Really wanted to have an easy way to sell items in person from my Shopify store. There's no way to even contact support because it literally sits on a loading page and does nothing else.

author: Sacrament Fashion
content: Awful, overpriced, and can I had multiple fraud charges due to the POS. None have been fixed and si m ce I refuse to renew my acct cst service or the lack thereof won't solve any of the issues that are 4 to 5 months old. I made over 400$ in sales and have yet to see one deposit. Small businesses don't use it. OWNBASE is just as awful and it's one of their main apps for TikTok. It messes up inventory which heavily affects the POS and the orders flowing in.

author: Shallette Del Rosario
content: Please fix search engine.. If I type 2 words it won't show unless I type it exactly how it's on shopify.. example: if item is "Table Top" it won't show if I typed in a different way like "Top Table" it would be nice as well if we could search words from item description.. SKU should also show up on code scanning.. we have QR codes on SKUs and it doesn't show upon scanning.. scanning only applies on barcodes apparently..

author: Aileen Torres
content: Terribly difficult to use and inflexible. Can only use Shopify Payments to use the tap and chip card readers. Otherwise you have to process credit card payments outside of Shopify. Functionality works differently on IOS and Android. Tap card reader doesn't wake up on Android. I have been told that I couldn't process credit card payments thru a 3rd party cc gateway, but somehow was able to process a manual cc payment on Android. The option didn't even show for IOS.

author: zeldamaniac44
content: Hi, there. I'm sorry to hear you did not have an ideal experience using the Point of Sale app. Our team would like to better understand your issue and ensure you're able to receive support. I recommend replying to your existing support ticket, or you can connect with us here: https://shopify.link/vRnL. -Victoria, Shopify Support.
developerResponse: NEVER TRUST SHOPIFY, If I could give them negative -5 stars, I would. Signed up and did my first test transaction. They said it would take a few days (to deposit) it's been over three months, and I STILL don't have my funds (good thing I have another PoS processor. Opened a dozen support tickets so far!!! They promise a lot, but they don't deliver anything valuable, don't even have a phone number, just chat support outsourced to a team that won't/can't help.

author: Kate Cascone
content: This program has so many bugs. I currently do not recommend. Tap and Chip Card readers take all my staff Apple and Droid users 10-15 min to sync or stay synced. The chip reader stops working. Upgraded to Premium with promises of more reporting functionality, nothing. still cant pull cash reports. Can only see total cash. None of my product variants are showing up with my pricing variables so im having to charge my customers whatever average price the POS picks. Im losing money here, Shopify.

author: Vera-Lynne Rheeder
content: This is becoming ridiculous! We have lodged complaints 3 times now and every time they say to uninsall an reinstall! It works for a day but then gives problems again! I cannot search for items when I have a client in my store, it's embarrassing! Seriously, fix this problem for the android devices already!

author: Vin Scavo
content: This app is an absolute abomination. It'll work for 5 minutes and then just randomly stop accepting cards. The absolute worst part is the boot up time takes forever. When you're busy small business you can't afford to wait 90 seconds to open a payment processor. Just needs a complete overhaul

author: Parsa Sabouri
content: It's not reliable, after a while the products that we search doesn't show up, we lost customers because they just waited too long..... The products that we search although they are active and available on the online store, isn't available on POS. We have to uninstall once in a while to fix the issue.

author: Pete Cooke
content: I don't really see the point of this app in the UK. Shopify payments (via stripe) don't work with Android devices. This isn't made explicitly clear on sign up. This makes Shopify POS on android tablets or even phones pretty useless as far as I can tell. We have to switch to iOS reluctantly.

author: A Google user
content: This app works really well in ringing sales in person. It pulls up products quickly and even allows you to make "quick" sales without specifying a product. You can also add customer information on the fly. The only trouble I've had with the app is in adding products but then the other shopify app handles that wonderfully.

author: Sandie W.
content: Downloaded this app only to find that NONE of the scans work...either the item is not actually offered...OR....can be holding the EXACT item and it will say that is isn't the item they wanted. If the item won't scan for the measley few points then I'm not going to buy the item either because it's not accepting the barcode. I have not found A SINGLE item at ANY of the stores. It's a waste of time and energy.

author: Paul Tayar
content: DO NOT UPGRADE. Old POS worked fine, new version looks cool and has some nice features but is missing half my inventory. Every 2nd item does not show and I have to manually write a line and then adjust the stock on another app. Not fun with a line of customers. Shopify have advised this is happening to multiple users and not just me. I can't roll back and my POS is a dead weight now. Don't upgrade to the new version until they sort this. It's totally screwed us.

author: Michelle Goyette
content: Actually being able to take swipe, tap, or insert card payments is not possible! HORRID experience. Chipper card reader ($50+) worked great when practicing, then day of event wouldn't work! It only allowed for manual entry of credit cards, which makes the device useless & cost us time + money because people walked away! And it looks sketchy manually entering. ENTIRE day tried to troubleshoot never worked. Once back, contacted support spent and hour + and still won't work! Absolutely distraught.

author: Khristin Quigley
content: Very disappointed in my POS system. Consistantly disconnecting, even mid checkout. Also completely logs me out mid checkout. The card reader disconnects and is so difficult to get it reconnected. I spend more time removing and reinstalling than I should. Frustrating as you are trying to checkout a sale. Thankful for my patient customers! This is not a POS system I would recommend.

author: B. Simpson
content: I've been using this app for years and never had an issue UNTIL NOW!! I have items that need added to my site, but the app updated on 8/16/24 and it hasn't worked right since! It won't upload a single picture no matter which way I try to do it, no matter where the file is located or what type of file or what size the file is. It won't load them! I can do the description, price, etc. but NO PICTURES. People won't buy if there's no pictures!!

author: William
content: Processed a $4,500 payment and after Square took their fee, they froze the funds and requested ID verification. I immediately submitted everything, yet they said it will take 3 business days to review. If refunded, it can take up to 7 business days to return to my client. Small businesses rely on cash flow. Freezing funds after processing a legitimate payment is unacceptable. Very disappointed.

author: Ryshelle
content: When it works, it's wonderful. Unfortunately today (during an event where I needed it), the app broke. It first prompted me to download the latest version since the old one was "no longer compatible." I did, tried to sign back in, and got the same message after the update. I had to totally uninstall and reinstall the app to fix the bug - and now tap to pay on my phone is gone. That's the only reason I have the app, and the feature is now missing. It requires hardware in order to use tap now :(

author: Nillastrator
content: I love using square for my pos system at markets, and it's very user friendly/easy to use!! I plan on using it as my main website soon (with the free subscription). I do wish there was an annual subscription cost option instead of just monthly payments. My main problem lately has been that the app keeps undoing my work (when I add an item or image it will save, but when I go back to the item later it's not there anymore). It's been frustrating and unusable since I can't edit or add any new items

author: Cody Buchanan
content: Increased my revenue by being able to accept cards square doubled my customer base not everyone can afford to pay cash but most have a credit or debit card and the small business loans through Square was easy to sign up for went straight into my account and helped with unexpected expenses they also had a great rate and very manageable to be able to pay back

author: Katlynn Stover
content: Was just on the phone over 30 minutes to get my free reader. Absolutely insane! If it's this stressful just setting up I'm worried about trying to use it daily. I had to go in circles with chat bot to even get the number for customer service & they really couldn't even tell me what the problem was. Probably have to use this service for the weekend but definitely looking for something better. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!

author: WebNet
content: I use the Square mobile app daily for work and it‚Äôs been extremely reliable. Payments process quickly, invoices are easy to send, and reporting is clear and accurate. The interface is simple and professional, which helps keep transactions smooth for customers. It saves me time every day and keeps my business organized.

author: Charles Taylor
content: I wish I could give 0 stars. I use square for my small business, Electrica. I used their banking services and I truly regret it. For 5 weeks I had to call over and over again to just transfer my money from savings to checking. it took 5 weeks, 25 different people and endless time on hold. a review was only suppose to take 1 to 2 days. I started jan 9th and was told 2 days, and just got it transferred today Feb 18. im deactivating this acct immediately. I never had a more miserable experience

author: Deace ESSC
content: square is the biggest joke of a company I have ever seen! there customer service is the worst ive ever dealt with in my 43 years of life. plus if you try to cash a check, they take the money out of the writers account right away and will not put it in your account for over a week, then when you call in about it, they email you back stating that you have been blocked from calling in to try and figure out where your money is, for a week! this is one of the most fraudulent companies ever!

author: Leonid Voinov
content: Looks modern and easy to use with many features. But when they suddenly hold your money all of that no longer matters. At that point you only remember that the service is unreliable and shows no respect for its users. I would strongly recommend staying away. My business is fully legal and compliant with banks and government requirements. It is safe and transparent. Square pushed online payments and once used my funds were frozen. I never had issues with checks or e-transfers.

author: Mark Hammerling
content: Has been working well but all of a sudden won't sync to either phone, tried everything possible. There is no way to contact support to help in these situations. Not the first time it has had trouble. Might be time to find another supplier if they can't support us considering the always take their fee's

author: Chris Rodgers
content: I've tried several other services and Square is by far the best I've found. More options to receive payments from customers than others. Customer friendly devices so I'm not explaining how to use it. I have had others tell me "their" rates were lower. And they were correct but they left out that was "their" take and I still had to pay the card companies fee on top of theirs. None of that slick talk with Square. Straight forward and nothing to blindside you with.

author: AARON LAROCCA
content: I have been using this app now. For a couple years, and every year, it gets worse in the beginning. You used to do a point of sale and the money would be in your square account with in a few hours. Now every transaction they hold for days sometimes weeks to make money off your money, they now say they need to do a review on every transaction e Even if it's the same customer, their 15th transaction shady company they're way far better processing apps out there. I will no longer be using this app.

author: Laefa Padillo
content: updated it and numpad support is gone in certain areas. have to use touchscreen. app wont work with printers that seamlessly work everywhere else. I dont want to shell out $200 for one of their approved printers. confusing system of categories and items.

author: Andrei Constantin
content: so I had the square account for a few months for personal use it worked fine with the reader until today,when I logged in it says i need to verify my account so I pressed to verify but it takes me every single time to purchase a reader not to verify anything. square are forcing me to buy another reader when I already have one but either way I tried to buy one to complete the step nothing happened this thing is just crushing and frustrating,I'm waiting for a reply

author: Mr600
content: brand new problem to add to the list.....we pay a membership subscription, yet service is still as poor as before....the map for delivery does NOT update every 20secs so there's no telling where the driver may be or when they may arrive or deliver order, it's increasingly irritating we have to pay for little to NO SERVICE!!

author: Dakota Creppel
content: I highly recommend NOT using Square for any transactions. I set up a Square account for a soccer team fundraiser using sales. After the very first sale, I received a notice that my account was under review. I then received a notice that my account was deactivated with no valid reason, and nobody, including a manager, can say what caused the deactivation. They are now holding all funds received for 180 days and do not allow for appeals, even with no chance of charge back from the sales.

author: Otto E. Chew Ottomatic Innovations corp.
content: This is so easy and fun even my dog has a good time ! We figured out the only way it could get any better is if the person who won was the one that actually received the reward not pay pal or cash app. That Sirs would make this experience go from 5 stars to a solid 10

author: Jay Rich
content: The "Square Point Of Sale" app has been around for years and has managed to stay on top of its game continuing to completely outdo its competitors in every way. Square is very user friendly, it's modern and high tech, Equipped with all desired settings and options that you would want. Now with multiple different choices of debit and credit card readers, Terminals and Point of sale cash registers. It's really the perfect Point Of Sale system for small businesses, entrepreneurs & Beginners alike.

author: Justin Case
content: If you live in a border town , don't bother with this app. call support they couldn't help me. if you're near the border , you cannot collect payments on this app. we'll say invalid location.

author: anthony penwell
content: ok although the fees are very high if I receive a payment transaction of $2,000 they always take $66 out to me that is extremely high as other apps like Square POS apps do not charge near that square is definitely the highest in fees so it would be nice to see them lower their fees because $60 just to process a transaction is insane other than that the app works fine sometimes it takes a while for them to process the transaction

author: Brian Gill
content: Easy to do. I like being able to withhold a percentage of my income for taxes automatically. One downside is that sometimes I need to enter a card manually and I get penalized for that.

author: Laura Griffith
content: they kicked me off with no notice, losing ALL my appt.s & futures appt.s & described services. All I could do was chat with one bot after another who all said the same stuff: "did you update?" did you turn your phone off & back on?" Did you close the app & get back on." etc. a WHOLE day, & had to go to a backup acct. Never got it fixed. Thank God for my backup.

author: Evgenii Iakimov
content: They closed my account for no reason after almost a year of operation, with a turnover of $800,000 and two outstanding loans. They're not refunding my account balance! Avoid these scammers! My lawyer is already working on this case.

author: Christopher Bridges
content: I am warning you, DO NOT USE THIS APP! They closed my account after I had a few customers pay me through tap to pay. They gave no explanation for closing my account and then told me that I should receive my money 2 days after they hold it for 180 days. I called customer service and was told the explanation for closing account was in email, it wasn't. Asked to speak to supervisor and was told no, I said, so you guys are stealing my money and don't care and Will, the c.s.r. said yeah and laughed.

author: Kevin Brinkley
content: I really like this app and I find it great and it would be five stars all day if y'all could fix this one bug issue where every time my app updates or an invoice is paid or if I move money or something the screen blacks out or lights out where I can't read any of the info and it's always around the 3rd or 4th update or opening or closing the app that it does it consistently making me have to close the app and restart it and wait for it to load back up and as long as I've had this app over a coup

author: Roselia Leon
content: near perfect i wish the part where you look at sales for the day was better at looking at fakes in the past. i wish it didn't automatically include sales from today when i want look in the past specifically. and i wish you can select the year easier to you gotta across each month one my one. annoying üòë

author: Brenda Cunningham
content: Always been a great and helpful tool. Only processed 1 sale in a 1 hour window yesterday. Guess my students are without their fundraising monies.

author: Josh Bogenreif
content: dear square i.t. department. you keep updating the software but there are subtle changes that slow service down and make it unceasingly more tedious for FOH stave. for example the most 2 recent updates changed the seach bar to a magnifying glass on the top right of where the tabs are and it is not user friendly to exit out of. SLOWING SERVICE DOWN.. another one most recent : the saved ticket feature: the ability to click save ticket and slide CC is now gone and you have to click new customer.

author: Mk Dlamini
content: After signing up online, I tried logging in on the app and it returns an error message "logged in too many times, account locked try again later" and that was only inputting the password once.

author: Daniel Gonzales
content: this app is horrible as soon as you start making money they find every reason to hold it and not release it to you they want to verify documents over and over again with the same question same information as the previous time I do not recommend getting this app it is not what they appear to be they make everything extremely difficult for you to transfer money in and out of accounts.

author: Ata Care
content: Please read the response from them to this review. Be ready for them to deactivate your account and when you get in touch with their none existent customers care they'll tell you they decided to cancel your account no other details at all after that you will receive customer care feedback. Update to to this idiotic response I'm not frustrated I'm stunned of your response one day everything is working fine and next day square decided to deactivate your account without any reason or explanation.

author: Evie Hillhouse
content: After just my first time using the square app and card reader, my account was deactivated and all of my funds are unavailable to me for almost 4 months. I wasn't given a chance to appeal and after calling the company they can't even tell me why this was happening. The only "solution" they gave me was to refund payments to the original sender, which doesn't help me at all. I highly encourage everyone to search for a different option for their business.

author: Brenna Hauversburk
content: I've been using square for my business for YEARS! I open it up to start the day and the new update says it's no longer compatible with my device! Beyond pissed! While I do LOVE square this really sucks! 1 star on the issue for this morning but 5 stars for the time I've had it.
developerResponse:
We appreciate you reaching out on this, and we are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused.

If you would like, please feel free to reach out to us over any of our support channels and we would be interested to see if there is anything we can help you with. We are here to help.

author: Carlos Ayala
content: Within the years, this app is just getting worse, and 6% fee p transaction is quite a lot if you are small business. There are more convenient options out there.

author: Dan Pugsley
content: these checks are worthless. I have 2 checks & I can't deposit them into my bank of america account by mobile deposit, or the atm. PayPal has also declined my checks. I created a square account, they also declined both checks. It's unbelievable. I have to contact the issuer and hope they can write me a personal check because square checks are not able to be deposited into any account ive tried several different ways. I have ran out of options. has anyone ever had success with these checks?

author: Ryan
content: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!! THEY TAKE YOUR MONEY BUT DO NOT DEPOSIT IT. They've had my money for a week already and keep changing the transfer date. isn't it convenient you can't talk to any costumer service ü§î.

author: Doug Dunn
content: The fees are steep but there are benefits. There are cheaper options available from your bank (if available). If other options aren't available, this app offers a range of services to help manage the finances of your business.

author: Marti K.
content: Quick & easy to use, mobile works just as well as desktop, reasonable cost, fast transfers, solid back end API to integrate into an e-commerce website, easy to read reports. Been using Square for a while now. I like it quite a bit.

author: Walton Prosen
content: The app quit working and customer service was outsourced. I don't speak broken English.
